name: ios-resolution
title: iOS Resolution
description: Display properties of every iPhone, iPad, iPod touch and Apple Watch Apple ever made
author: ertem_biyik

commands.name: list-all-devices
commands.title: iOS Resolutions
commands.description: Browse and search iOS device resolutions

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
